price: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wanjye yanyoboye inzira igororotse; idini ritunganye, inzira ya Aburahamu, wasengaga Imana imwe rukumbi, kandi ntabe mu babangikanyamana.”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّنِي هَدَىٰنِي رَبِّيٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ دِينٗا قِيَمٗا مِّلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۚ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qul innanī hadānī rabbī ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin dīnan qiyaman millata ib'rāhīma ḥanīfan wamā kāna mina al-mush'rikīna
